description.english: I can't even capture it on my camera.

displayName.french: Une fille doit aussi se nourrir
displayName.japanese: こう見えてお腹がすくんです

description.english: Fed thy noble queen 3 times during one visit to her quarters.
description.german: Euer edles Ross 3 mal, während desselben Besuchs der Ställe, gefüttert
description.french: Vous avez nourri le noble destrier 3 fois lors d'une seule visite à l'écurie
description.italian: Hai nutrito il tuo nobile destriero 3 volte durante una visita alle stalle
description.koreana: 그대의 고귀한 여왕의 방에 가 있는 동안 3번 먹이를 주었습니다.
description.spanish: Alimentasteis 3 veces al noble corcel en una visita a sus establos
description.japanese: 1 回の馬小屋への訪問で、3 回馬に餌をやった
description.russian: Покормить своего благородного рысака трижды за один визит в конюшню
description.tchinese: 在單次前往駿馬馬廄期間餵食她 3 次

description.english: Showed thine worst enemy, the abomination known as "The Darkness", who is the nerdiest of them all.
description.german: Eurem ärgsten Feind, der Abscheuligkeit ''Finsternis'', gezeigt, wer der größte Nerd von Allen ist
description.french: Vous avez montré à votre pire ennemi, l'abomination ''Les Ténèbres'', qui est le plus gros geek.
description.italian: Hai smascherato il tuo peggior nemico, l'abominio noto come ''L'Oscurità'',  il più strano di tutti
description.koreana: 'The Darkness'로 알려진 혐오스러운 그대의 숙적에게 누가 제일 바보인지 보여주었습니다.
description.spanish: Demostrasteis a vuestra enemiga mortal "la Oscuridad" quién es el más friki
description.japanese: The Darkness と呼ばれる宿敵に打ち勝った
description.russian: Проучить своего злейшего врага, известного под именем Тьма, который есть величайший ботан в мире
description.tchinese: 讓那名為「The Darkness」的怪胎死對頭知道誰才是最強阿宅

displayName.german: Und die so "Hey, das ist meins"
displayName.russian: А они все такие: «Э, это мое!»
displayName.tchinese: 只聽它們慘叫道：「喂那是我的啦」

description.english: Unsheathed 5 swords from Immortal Skeletaurs without leaving the area.
description.german: 5 Schwerter aus wachen Unsterblichen Skeletauren gezogen, ohne die Umgebung zu verlassen
description.french: Vous avez retiré 5 épées de Squelettaures Immortels vivants sans quitter la zone.
description.italian: Hai estratto 5 spade dagli scheletauri immortali senza lasciare l'area
description.koreana: 지역을 떠나지 않고 Immortal Skeletaurs에게서 검 5개를 뽑았습니다.
description.spanish: Desenvainasteis 5 espadas de skeletaurs inmortales sin abandonar el nivel
description.japanese: エリアを離れずに、Immortal Skeletaur 5 体から剣を引き抜いた
description.russian: Вытащить 5 мечей из бессмертных скелетавров, не покидая окрестностей
description.tchinese: 在不離開該區域的狀況下，從 Immortal Skeletaurs 身上拔出 5 把劍

displayName.english: Dang Girl You Ace At This Game

description.english: Won the most challenging round in Murderlin's Temple.

description.italian: Hai vinto il round più difficile nel Murderlin's Temple

description.spanish: Triunfasteis en la ronda más exigente del Templo de Asesín

description.english: Demonstrated your skill, or lack thereof, at rolling the magical treasure orb of many sides.
description.german: Dein Können, oder dessen Abwesenheit, beim Wurf der magischen Schatzkugel der vielen Seiten gezeigt
description.french: Vous avez montré votre talent ou poisse au jeu de l'orbe magique multifacette.
description.italian: Hai dimostrato la tua abilità, o mancanza della stessa, nell'usare la magica sfera dalle molte facce
description.koreana: 마법의 보물 Orb를 여러 방향으로 굴려 자신의 스킬 또는 약점을 보여주었습니다.
description.spanish: Demostrasteis vuestras virtudes, o vuestras carencias, lanzando el orbe mágico

description.russian: Продемонстрировать свои таланты или отсутствие оных, бросив многогранный волшебный шар
description.tchinese: 已在扔擲魔幻寶藏二十面骰時，展現你的擲骰技術，或者說…你只是純靠運氣而已？

displayName.japanese: 打倒！ レイド ボス
